headline: What Iron Mountain (IRM)'s McLaren Partnership and Debt Concerns Mean For Shareholders
summary: Iron Mountain was recently announced as an official partner of the McLaren Formula 1 Team, with its branding featured on McLaren race cars starting at the 2025 United States Grand Prix, and will lead McLaren Racing’s digital heritage transformation through its AI-powered platform. This collaboration boosts Iron Mountain's brand visibility and advances its digital solutions ambitions, but it comes amidst increased investor concern over the company’s high debt levels and recent insider...
